mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiries (inqry_id, inqry_type_cd, inqry_trgt_type_cd, wrtr_id, inqry_store_id, inqry_ttl, inqry_cn, prvt_yn, prcs_stts, prcs_user_no, mdfcn_ymd, del_dt, del_user_no, del_actvtn_yn) VALUES (#{inqryId}, #{inqryTypeCd}, #{inqryTrgtTypeCd}, #{wrtrId}, #{inqryStoreId}, #{inqryTtl}, #{inqryCn}, #{prvtYn}, #{prcsStts}, #{prcsUserNo}, #{mdfcnYmd}, #{delDt}, #{delUserNo}, #{delActvtnYn})
mapper.select: SELECT inqry_id, inqry_type_cd, inqry_trgt_type_cd, wrtr_id, inqry_store_id, inqry_ttl, inqry_cn, prvt_yn, prcs_stts, prcs_user_no, reg_ymd, mdfcn_ymd, del_dt, del_user_no, del_actvtn_yn FROM inquiries ORDER BY reg_ymd DESC

SELECT inqry_id, inqry_type_cd, inqry_trgt_type_cd, wrtr_id, inqry_store_id, inqry_ttl, inqry_cn, prvt_yn, prcs_stts, prcs_user_no, reg_ymd, mdfcn_ymd, del_dt, del_user_no, del_actvtn_yn FROM inquiries WHERE inqry_id = #{inquiryId}

SELECT i.inqry_id, i.inqry_type_cd, i.inqry_trgt_type_cd, i.wrtr_id, i.inqry_store_id, i.inqry_ttl, i.inqry_cn, i.prvt_yn, i.prcs_stts, i.prcs_user_no, i.reg_ymd, i.mdfcn_ymd, i.del_dt, i.del_user_no, i.del_actvtn_yn FROM inquiries i WHERE i.inqry_id = #{inquiryId}
SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(inqry_id, 5) AS UNSIGNED)) AS maxId FROM inquiries WHERE inqry_id LIKE 'inq_%' AND SUBSTRING(inqry_id, 5) REGEXP '^[0-9]+$';

SELECT inqry_id, inqry_type_cd, inqry_trgt_type_cd, wrtr_id, inqry_store_id, inqry_ttl, inqry_cn, prvt_yn, prcs_stts, prcs_user_no, reg_ymd, mdfcn_ymd, del_dt, del_user_no, del_actvtn_yn FROM inquiries ORDER BY reg_ymd DESC, inqry_id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startRow}
